recipe.title: 3-ingredient Strawberry Icebox Cake Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Spread a thin layer of whipped cream in a square glass baking dish.
Layer graham crackers on top, then cover with a layer of whipped cream.
Sprinkle ⅓ of the strawberries on top, then layer with cream again.
Repeat steps 2 and 3 until no more ingredients remain. (The top layer should be strawberries and should not be covered with cream.)

steps_updated.steps_updated: Spread a thin layer of whipped cream in a square glass baking dish.
Layer graham crackers on top, then cover with a layer of whipped cream.
Sprinkle ⅓ of the strawberries on top, then layer with cream again.
Repeat steps 2 and 3 until no more ingredients remain.
(The top layer should be strawberries and should not be covered with cream.)
